top_comments.comment: Dude is missing a few shots. Kinda refreshing to see, given how long the game is, it'd be impossible to perfect every section of it, especially with somewhat volatile enemy Ai to contend with.

32:48

Listening to this with no headphones lol...people would definitely wonder what you're watching.😅
Tomb Raider (2013) & Rise of the Tomb Raider were both amazing games.
Did any one else notice how Lara's face expressions and body animation reminds of old prince of Persia games, literary dejavu moment.

40:27 "Something about being on the radio lets Lara fly." 
That's just how Sam makes her feel.
